README - Production System
===========================

This directory contains the production deployment configuration and data files.

Important Files:
- config.txt: Main application configuration
- secret.txt: Sensitive credentials (DO NOT SHARE)
- install.txt: Installation logs
- report.txt: System health reports

Maintenance:
- Weekly backups run automatically every Sunday at 2:00 AM
- Log rotation configured for 30-day retention
- Contact: ops-team@company.invalid

For emergency issues, escalate to on-call engineer.
